experiences.title: Angular Developer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Superstars
workDescription: Collaborated with the stakeholders to review and refine website requirements serving a clientele exceeding 10,000 users.
Transformed mock designs to Angular utilizing best practices, enacting MVC and Singleton design patterns.
Exhibited strong aptitude as a quick learner by swiftly acquiring proficiency in the Angular framework    within weeks, resulting in 20% acceleration of project development.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Cimpress India Private Limited
workDescription: Orchestrated integration of CI/CD tools using AWS Lambda and S3, curtailing build times by 30%.
Revamped serving of images using .NET and AWS S3, producing a 35% faster page load.
Collaborated with product managers and designers to design, debug, deploy and maintain frontend and backend software for a user base of 100k+ users, while adhering to best practices.
Mentored and supported new team members, resulting in a 15% reduction in training budget due to accelerated onboarding and knowledge transfer.
Played an instrumental role in the optimization of a microservice leveraging .NET Core backend, React.js for UI/UX that increased sales by 8%. Contributed to unit testing and thorough code reviews.
Analyzed and refactored several features resulting in improved maintainability and enhanced overall system performance by 7%.
